entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 9:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain or rain before morning. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to snow or ice pellets late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
